data.name: The Classrooms
data.detailed_description:
The Classrooms is a procedural liminal-space found footage survival horror game. It aims to create a tense Liminal Aesthetic/Atmosphere, made infinitely mind-bending and replayable due to the procedural nature of it’s large sprawling world. That world is detailed with deep physics interactions, terrifying exploration, and unpredictably intelligent AI entities that range from harmless to extremely dangerous. Can you decipher this secrets this place holds?

Tell your own story on your own cursed VHS tape in The Classrooms.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.6Ghz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 480 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements will be adjusted closer to release
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel i7 3Ghz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: More advanced graphics options available for those with higher end machines (ie RTX)
